name: Rewind: Not Karlson, okay?
description:
Tutorials are in-game.

THIS IS NOT KARLSON OKAY? IT IS NOT KARLSON GET OVER IT!

Rate my game after you play it, or you are banned from drinking milk!

Have fun, I worked hard for this hope you enjoy it.

good luck have fun

amongus by Thev2Andy and Redline. Thanks guys!
